messages.title: Welcome to Integration Manager System Messages
messages.content:
This new feature allows you to receive important announcements and updates about the Integration Manager.

Messages are marked as read automatically when you view this page.

messages.title: Orphaned Entities Diagnostics Available
messages.content:
A new Diagnostics page has been added to help identify orphaned entities in your activities.

Orphaned entities can prevent activities from functioning properly. Visit the Diagnostics page to see if any activities need attention.

messages.title: Notification Settings Enhanced
messages.content:
You can now receive notifications for:

  • Integration updates
  • New integrations detected
  • Integration errors
  • Orphaned entities in activities

Configure your preferences in the Notifications settings page.

messages.title: Orphaned IR Codesets Cleanup Tool Released
messages.content:
A new diagnostic tool has been released to help you identify and clean up orphaned IR codesets in your Remotes.

Visit the Diagnostics page to see if you have any orphaned IR codesets and learn more about this new feature and how it can help you maintain your integrations.

messages.title: Sort options in available integrations
messages.content:
New sort options are now available in the integrations list.

You can sort integrations by name, github stars, downloads, newest, and last updated to help you find what you need more easily.

Due to github API limitations, it will take up to 8 hours for the initial cache of github data to complete.
